title: Tired College Student

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- (Day) Make everyone stress about an upcoming deadline, shortening the day by six hours. If there are less than six hours left in the day, the day instantly ends.
- (Night) Ask for a quiz. This gives you a short. If you receive a passing grade, you gain Powerful defense for the night and deal a Basic attack to a random player.
- (Night, after two passed quizzes) Ask to take the final exam. This will be a harder quiz that only you receive. If you pass this, you win the game and get to modkill a player of your choice.

desc:
Post 3548
*"God, where has all the time gone. Where am I?"*
